app.name: BJJ Schedule
app.title: BJJ Schedule
app.description: Discover and explore Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu classes around the world. Search by location, time, instructor, and more.

footer.description: BJJ Schedule helps you find Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu classes worldwide. Whether you're traveling or looking for a new academy, we've got you covered.

auth.verificationSent: Verification email sent. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to verify your account.
auth.resetPasswordSent: Password reset email sent. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password.
auth.loginDescription: Log in to your BJJ Schedule account to manage your favorite academies and classes.
auth.signupDescription: Create a BJJ Schedule account to save your favorite academies, get notifications, and more.

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.somethingWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.
notFound.message: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with the BJJ Schedule team. We're here to help with any questions or feedback.
contact.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
